data.text:
ðŸ’°Hadassah Richardson Net worth: $200K - $300K

About

Model who rocketed to fame after she was cast through social media on the 22nd cycle and final season of the hit reality competition America's Next Top Model. She has also amassed a significant Instagram following of more than 70,000 fans.

Before Fame

She first auditioned for America's Next Top Model at the age of eighteen but was told she was too short. Thereafter she began her pageant career.

Trivia

She is well known as a pageant queen, winning the title of Miss Sugar Land in 2013.

Family Life

She moved to Houston, Texas at the age of seven where she spent the rest of her childhood.

Associated With

She competed against fellow model and contestant Nyle DiMarco on the final season of America's Next Top Model.
